message.body: Hey Kyle did you evere hear anything about the free union tickets from winning the game we went to?
(1/2) No i didn't, i remember the guy said to email him. I didn't do it yet; i was hoping he would get in touch with people first but i might email him today or
Ok I will email him today thanks
Good deal, can you let me know what he says?
Doug said he would email us probably in August about the free tickets
